text: [Music] hey everyone welcome to this ancient wisdom Money Matters Channel where today we're diving into topic of Agriculture trends that the world watches as Farms transform no longer places of simple tools and timeworn tradition they are now hubs of Cutting Edge technology this is the era of smart agriculture it's a revolution driven by the need to feed a growing population we need to produce more food more efficiently and all while caring for our planet smart agriculture power by technology is rising to the challenge this is not just about better yields but about a smarter more sustainable future for farming the numbers speak for themselves the global smart agriculture Market is booming predicted to reach a staggering 33 billion by 2027 farmers are embracing technology like never before eager to harness its power from sensors that monitor soil Health to drones that survey vast Fields the future of farming is here imagine a world where your farm tells you what it needs even before the first Leaf wilts that's the promise of the internet of things or iot tiny sensors are scattered throughout the fields like digital eyes and ears they monitor everything from soil moisture and temperature to the amount of sunlight reaching the crops this constant stream of data is gold to a farmer with this information a farmer can make precise informed decisions need more water in one corner of the field the sensors will tell you is the soil lacking vital nutrients the data Reveals All This targeted approach means less waste and higher yields water and fertilizers are used only where needed saving money and protecting the [Music] environment artificial intelligence or AI is no longer a futuristic fantasy it's here and it's changing the way we Farm AI algorithms with their ability to analyze vast amounts of data are like digital brains for modern agriculture they can process information from sensors drones and even historical weather patterns to give Farmers a level of insight never seen before imagine predicting the weather with Incredible accuracy weeks in advance AI can do that helping Farmers plan their planting and harvesting schedules AI can also detect diseases in Plants before they're even visible to the human eye preventing widespread crop loss this is farming with a level of precision and foresight that was once unimaginable section four taking to the skies drones and agriculture drones are no longer just for aerial photography they've become essential Tools in modern agriculture offering a bird's eye view of the farm equipped with high resolution cameras and sensors drones can survey vast fields in a fraction of the time it would take a farmer on foot this rapid data collect ction is invaluable need to assess the health of your crops send in the drones they can identify areas where plants are stressed or diseased allowing for targeted treatment drones can even apply pesticides and fertilizers with pinpoint accuracy minimizing waste and environmental impact this aerial Revolution is saving Farmers time money and resources section five data the new soil of farming in the digital age data is the new soil farming it's the foundation on which smart agriculture thrives all the technology we've discussed from sensors to drones generates a treasure Trove of data but raw data is useless unless we can understand it that's where data analytics comes in by crunching numbers and identifying patterns data analytics unlocks the secrets hidden within the data farmers can see Trends in their yields identify factors affecting crop health and make data-driven decisions that optimize their operations this is precision agriculture at its finest using data to make every decision count section six cultivating a sustainable future the future of farming is not just about technology it's about sustainability as we Face the challenges of climate change and a growing population we need to produce food in a way that protects our planet for generations to come smart agriculture with its emphasis on efficiency and datadriven decisionmaking offers a path forward regenerative agriculture a system of farming principles that focuses on soil health and biodiversity is gaining traction vertical farming where crops are grown in vertically stacked layers offers a way to produce food in urban areas reducing our Reliance on traditional farming practices these Innovations combined with the power of Technology offer hope for a future where farming and sustainability go hand inand if you're enjoying this video and want to take your skills to the next level I highly recommend joining skillshare it's an amazing platform where you can access thousands of classes on plus by signing up through my link below you'll not only get skills but also directly support my channel helping me create more content like this let's learn and grow together don't forget to hit that subscribe button and turn on notifications you'll be the first to know when I post new videos and there's plenty more exciting stuff on the way
